title: Multimedia Terminal Adapter (MTA) Management Information Base for PacketCable- and IPCablecom-Compliant Devices
abstract:
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)
for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.
In particular, it defines a basic set of managed objects for
Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP)-based management of
PacketCable- and IPCablecom-compliant Multimedia Terminal Adapter devices.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
